moves.2... Nf6: Never really faced this actual opening.... hmm wat to do
moves.4... Qf6: threatening checkmate Qf3 also threatening to take Ne5. Looks like im dead
moves.5. Qh5: Looks can be decieving. Queen now protects Knight attacks the f7 pawn and now the king has elbow room to move. Plus more pressure on the f pawn.
moves.6... g6: Am I supposed to be scared of that?
moves.8. Bxg6: Now at first sight you would expect him to take it with the h pawn. But then you realize that then the rook will be completely exposed.  Now that I look back I shouldve taken that pawn with the knight attacking the rook. O well.
moves.9. Bxe4: His knight was being problematic anyway. I might as well trade.
moves.10... Kd8: I thought this move was genius until later i realized my mistake.
moves.11... Bg4+: Almost a checkmate. But i still have my bishop.
moves.15. Ke2: then again if he takes i take his bishop so tats good
moves.15... Ke7: ... guess he doesnt like that deal
moves.18. Nc3: Knight goes out to protect the bishop with rook
moves.22... Kf7: Making it so that his knight isnt pinned
moves.23. dxe5: take free knight. But at the cost of pinning my own.
moves.23... Bb4: threatening checkmate... or something rather. He wants me to take it with my queen. So that my knight is undefended. so tat i lose the knight.
moves.25. Qf5+: After much thought I realized even though it looks like im about to lose. I have a cool move just watch. Its called foresight
moves.25... Ke8: ok if he had gone to the right i couldve forced a free rook. O well. Watch this
moves.27. Bh6+: nice isnt it. Bet someone's cursing
moves.28. Qxh6+: Queen takes. There goes that troublesome queen. and i still check him. This is the life
moves.29. cxb4: I take bishop. Heck eventually my knight's dead. Might as well get a good trade out of it
moves.30. Kc2: but you cant checkmate me with just that. Which he will soon find out
moves.30... Rxe5: takes a pawn that had control of the center. But this far in the game thats not really that important.
moves.31... Re2+: ? wat does he plan to accomplish with that
moves.32. Kc1: Man hopefully ill be able to move Qh5 but he wont fall for that
moves.33... Ke6: Wow it took him 3 days to think that move up?
moves.34. Qxe2+: thank you for the free rook.
moves.35. Rf1+: But i got u in conditional move
